description.english: United in the struggle to better ourselves.
description.german: Vereint im Kampf, immer besser zu werden.
description.french: Unis dans notre quête d’enrichissement.
description.italian: Uniti nella lotta per migliorare noi stessi.
description.brazilian: Unidos na luta para nos tornarmos melhores.
description.spanish: Unidos en tiempos difíciles para dar lo mejor de nosotros mismos.
description.russian: Объединение в поисках лучших себя.
description.schinese: 团结一致，成就更好的自己。
description.tchinese: 奮力團結，讓自己更強大。
description.koreana: 시련 속에서 단결하여, 더 나은 사람으로 거듭났습니다.

description.english: Set out on a journey to confront the evil warlord, Ravannavar.
description.german: Du bist auf die Reise aufgebrochen, den bösen Kriegsherren Ravannavar zu stellen.
description.french: Voyage entrepris pour affronter le seigneur de guerre maléfique Ravannavar.
description.italian: Inizia un viaggio per affrontare il malvagio condottiero Ravannavar.
description.brazilian: Partiu em uma jornada para confrontar o terrível senhor da guerra, Ravannavar.
description.spanish: Has iniciado tu viaje para acabar con el malvado señor de la guerra Ravannavar.
description.russian: Начало путешествия и схватка со злобным лордом Раваннаваром.
description.schinese: 踏上讨伐邪恶的战争领主，拉文那瓦的旅程。
description.tchinese: 開始旅行，準備與邪惡軍閥羅波那瓦一較高下。
description.koreana: 악랄하기 짝이 없는 전쟁 군주, 라반나바르에 맞서 싸우기 위하여 여정을 떠났습니다.

displayName.english: From The Frying Pan Into the Fire
displayName.spanish: Sal de la sartén para caer en las brasas

description.english: Reached the center of the world, the hard way.
description.german: Du hast das Zentrum der Welt erreicht (auf die harte Tour).
description.french: Centre du monde atteint, avec difficulté.
description.italian: Hai raggiunto il centro del mondo seguendo il percorso più difficile.
description.brazilian: Chegou ao centro da terra, da forma mais difícil.
description.spanish: Has llegado al centro del mundo... por la vía difícil.
description.russian: Как попасть в центр мира сложным способом.
description.schinese: 历经千辛万苦，抵达世界的中心。
description.tchinese: 成功抵達困難重重的世界中心。
description.koreana: 온갖 고생을 겪으며 세상의 중심에 도달했습니다.

description.english: Awakened the power of Heruka, the wrathful deity.
description.german: Du hast die Macht von Heruka, der zornigen Gottheit, erweckt.
description.french: Le pouvoir d’Heruka, le dieu vengeur, est réveillé.
description.italian: Hai risvegliato la potenza di Heruka, la divinità infuriata.
description.brazilian: Despertou o poder de Heruka, o deus do ódio.
description.spanish: Has despertado el poder de Heruka, la deidad iracunda.
description.russian: Пробуждение силы Херуки, разгневанной богини.
description.schinese: 觉醒明王之力，愤怒之神。
description.tchinese: 成功喚醒憤怒之神——赫魯嘎的力量。
description.koreana: 분노에 찬 신적 존재, 헤루카의 힘을 일깨웠습니다.

displayName.english: Port Maerifa, Gateway to the World
displayName.french: Port Maerifa, porte sur le monde
displayName.brazilian: Porto Maerifa, o Caminho para o Mundo
displayName.spanish: Puerto Maerifa, el portal al mundo
displayName.schinese: 梅尔瑞法港，通往世界的大门
displayName.tchinese: 通往世界的大門：馬耶瑞法港口

description.english: Arrived in the bustling town of Port Maerifa, gateway to the world.
description.german: Du bist im Maerifa-Hafen angekommen, dem Tor zur Welt.
description.french: La ville animée de Port Maerifa, porte sur le monde, est atteinte.
description.italian: Sei nella vivace città di Porto Maerifa, l'ingresso del mondo.
description.brazilian: Chegou na cidade de Porto Maerifa, o caminho para o resto do mundo.
description.spanish: Has llegado a la ajetreada ciudad de Puerto Maerifa, el portal al mundo.
description.russian: Вы прибыли в оживленный порт Мерифу — врата в мир.
description.schinese: 抵达梅尔瑞法港内的繁华小镇，通往世界的大门。
description.tchinese: 成功抵達馬耶瑞法港口的熱鬧城市，亦是通往世界的大門。
description.koreana: 사람들이 북적거리는 세계의 관문, 마에리파 항구에 도달했습니다.

displayName.spanish: Avaricia en la ciudad del neón

description.english: Deposed the Crime Lord Mara and ended his insatiable greed.
description.german: Du hast den Schurken Mara erledigt und seine unstillbare Gier beendet.
description.french: Le seigneur du crime Mara a été destitué, et son avidité insatiable a pris fin.
description.italian: Hai deposto il signore del crimine, Mara, e messo fine alla sua avidità insaziabile.
description.brazilian: Derrotou o criminoso Mara e deu fim à sua insaciável ganância.
description.spanish: Has acabado con el señor del crimen Mara y has puesto fin a su codicia insaciable.
description.russian: Вы избавились от преступного главаря Мары и положили конец его безмерной жадности.
description.schinese: 击败犯罪之王玛拉，终结他永无止境的贪婪。
description.tchinese: 成功推翻犯罪領導人魔羅，終止他無邊無際的貪慾。
description.koreana: 암흑가의 제왕 마라를 제압하여, 끝없는 욕심의 종지부를 찍었습니다.

description.english: Stopped the Serpent Queen from sealing her citizens away from the world.
description.german: Du hast die Schlangenkönigin davon abgehalten, ihr Volk vor der Welt zu verstecken.
description.french: La Reine serpent a été empêchée d’isoler ses citoyens du reste du monde.
description.italian: Hai impedito alla Regina Serpente di segregare i suoi concittadini.
description.brazilian: Impediu a Rainha Serpente de prender seus cidadãos para mantê-los longe do resto do mundo.
description.spanish: Has evitado que la Reina Serpiente encerrase a sus ciudadanos y los apartase del mundo.
description.russian: Вы прекратили кражу Королевой-Змеей ее подданных из мира.
description.schinese: 阻止蛇后将子民封印起来。
description.tchinese: 成功阻止蛇后將人民與世隔離。
description.koreana: 국민들을 세상으로부터 고립시키려던 뱀 여왕을 저지했습니다.

displayName.english: The Wrath of the Iron Kingdom
displayName.french: La colère du Royaume de fer
displayName.brazilian: O Ódio do Reino de Ferro
displayName.spanish: La ira del Reino de Hierro

description.english: Destroyed the Iron Kingdom's menacing war machine, MOLOCH.
description.german: Du hast die bedrohliche Kriegsmaschine des Eisenkönigreichs zerstört - MOLOCH.
description.french: La machine de guerre effrayante du Royaume de fer, MOLOCH, a été détruite.
description.italian: Hai distrutto la minacciosa macchina da guerra del Regno di Ferro: il MOLOCH.
description.brazilian: Destruiu a ameaçadora máquina de guerra do Reino de Ferro, o MOLOCH.
description.spanish: Has acabado con MOLOCH, la amenazante máquina de guerra del Reino de Hierro.
description.russian: Вы уничтожили МОЛОХ — ужасную военную машину Железного Королевства.
description.schinese: 摧毁钢铁军团的战争机器，炎魔。
description.tchinese: 成功破壞鐵之國的恐怖戰爭機器「摩洛神」。
description.koreana: 살기등등한 강철 왕국의 전쟁 병기, 몰록을 파괴했습니다.

description.english: Accepted and channeled the rage within, awakening Maha Heruka.
description.german: Du hast den Zorn in dir angenommen und ihn gelenkt, so dass du Maha Heruka erweckt hast.
description.french: La rage intérieure a été acceptée et canalisée, réveillant Maha Heruka.
description.italian: Hai accettato e incanalato la rabbia dentro di te, risvegliando Maha Heruka.
description.brazilian: Aceitou e incorporou o ódio interior, o que fez despertar Maha Heruka.
description.spanish: Has aceptado y canalizado la ira de tu interior, despertando así a Maha Heruka.
description.russian: Вы приняли и направили ярость, пробудив Маха-Херуку.
description.schinese: 接受并引导自身的怒火，唤醒摩诃明王
description.tchinese: 成功接受並轉換內在怒氣，喚醒摩訶赫魯嘎。
description.koreana: 내면의 분노를 받아들이고 마음을 쏟아, 마하 헤루카를 일깨웠습니다.

description.english: Toppled Garuda Cruel and set Tai Krung City free at last.
description.german: Du hast Garuda Cruel vom Thron gestoßen und Tai Krung endlich befreit.
description.french: Garuda Cruel est renversé et Tai Krung est enfin libre.
description.italian: Hai rovesciato Garuda Cruel e liberato Tai Krung.
description.brazilian: Venceu Garuda Cruel e libertou a Cidade de Tai Krung de uma vez por todas.
description.spanish: Has derrocado a Garuda Cruel y liberado por fin la ciudad de Tai Krung.
description.russian: Вы победили Гаруду Жестокого и наконец-то освободили Тай Крунг.
description.schinese: 击败残忍嘎鲁达，解放泰库朗城。
description.tchinese: 成功推翻迦樓羅苦魯，讓汰京城重獲自由。
description.koreana: 가루다 크루얼을 쓰러뜨리고, 타이 크룽에 자유를 선사했습니다.

description.english: Confronted Obsidian Wind, Kaanul's self-fulfilling prophecy.
description.german: Du hast dich dem Obsidian-Wind gestellt, der selbsterfüllenden Prophezeiung von Kaanul.
description.french: Le Vent d’obsidienne, la prophétie autoréalisatrice de Kaanul, a été combattue.
description.italian: Hai affrontato il Vento di Ossidiana della profezia di Kaanul.
description.brazilian: Enfrentou o Vento Obsidiano, a profecia de Kaanul.
description.spanish: Te has enfrentado al Viento de Obsidiana, la profecía autocumplida de Kaanul.
description.russian: Вы столкнулись с Обсидиановым Ветром — самосбывающимся пророчеством Каанула.
description.schinese: 解决黑曜石之风，卡努尔自我满足的预言。
description.tchinese: 對決喀努爾的自我應驗預言：黑曜石之風。
description.koreana: 카눌 일대에 예언으로 전해지던 흑요석 바람과 맞서 싸웠습니다.

description.english: Dissolved the Slime Queen and freed Queen Mary from its clutches.
description.german: Du hast die Schleimkönigin aufgelöst und Königin Mary aus ihren Fängen befreit.
description.french: La Reine de la vase a été dissoute et la reine Mary a été libérée de son emprise.
description.italian: Hai dissolto la Regina di Melma e liberato la Regina Mary dalla sua presa.
description.brazilian: Dissolveu a Rainha Geleca e libertou a Rainha Mary.
description.spanish: Has disuelto a la reina del pringue y liberado a la reina Mary de sus garras.
description.russian: Вы растворили Королеву Слизи и освободили Королеву Мэри из ее оков.
description.schinese: 解决史莱姆女王，救出玛丽。
description.tchinese: 溶解黏泥后，釋放被他囚禁的瑪莉王后。
description.koreana: 슬라임 여왕을 무찌르고, 그녀한테 사로잡혀 있던 마리 여왕을 구해냈습니다.

description.english: Summited Mt. Sumeru, gateway to the heavens.
description.german: Du hast den Sumeru-Berg erklommen, das Tor zum Himmel.
description.french: Le sommet du mont Sumeru, porte vers le paradis, a été atteint.
description.italian: Hai compiuto l'ascesa al Monte Sumeru, l'ingresso dei cieli.
description.brazilian: Chegou ao topo do Monte Sumeru, o portal para o paraíso.
description.spanish: Has llegado a lo alto del monte Sumeru, el portal a los cielos.
description.russian: Вы поднялись на вершину горы Сумеру — врат в рай.
description.schinese: 到达须弥山顶峰，通向天国的大门。
description.tchinese: 成功攻頂須彌山，抵達通往天堂之門。
description.koreana: 천국의 관문이라고 불리는 수메루 산의 정상에 도달했습니다.

description.english: Stopped Kala from resetting the world.
description.german: Du hast Kala davon abgehalten, die Welt zurückzusetzen.
description.french: Kala a été empêchée de réinitialiser le monde.
description.italian: Hai impedito a Kala di azzerare il mondo.
description.brazilian: Impediu que Kala reiniciasse o mundo.
description.spanish: Has evitado que Kala reiniciase el mundo.
description.russian: Вы помешали Кале обнулить мир.
description.schinese: 阻止卡拉重置这个世界。
description.tchinese: 成功阻止卡拉重設世界。
description.koreana: 세상을 다시 만들려는 칼라의 음모를 저지했습니다.

description.english: Attuned to all seven of Loka's Chakra Gates.
description.german: Du hast dich mit allen sieben der Chakra-Toren in Loka harmonisiert.
description.french: Harmonisation effectuée avec les sept portes de chakras de Loka.
description.italian: Sei in sintonia con tutti e sette i Portali Chakra di Loka.
description.brazilian: Conectou-se com todos os sete Portais de Chakra em Loka.
description.spanish: Has entrado en sintonía con los siete Portales de Chakra de Loka.
description.russian: Вы настроились на все семь Врат Чакр.
description.schinese: 调和全部七座洛卡的查克拉之门。
description.tchinese: 成功把洛卡的七道脈輪門全對上頻率。
description.koreana: 일곱 개에 달하는 로카의 차크라 관문을 전부 조율했습니다.

description.english: Recruited a new friend to join you on your journey.
description.german: Du hast einen neuen Freund rekrutiert, der dich auf deiner Reise begleitet.
description.french: Un nouvel ami a été recruté pour vous rejoindre dans votre voyage.
description.italian: Hai reclutato una nuova amicizia nel tuo viaggio.
description.brazilian: Recrutou um novo amigo para se juntar a você na sua jornada.
description.spanish: Has reclutado a una nueva amistad para que te acompañe en tu viaje.
description.russian: Вы уговорили нового друга присоединиться к вашему путешествию.
description.schinese: 雇佣一位新朋友加入你的队伍。
description.tchinese: 成功請一位新朋友加入你的這趟旅程。
description.koreana: 당신과 함께 여정을 이어갈 친구를 사귀었습니다.

description.english: Upgraded to Attack Level 3.
description.german: Du hast deinen Angriff auf Level 3 gesteigert.
description.french: Niveau d’attaque 3 atteint.
description.italian: Potenziato al livello attacco 3.
description.brazilian: Aprimorou o Ataque para o nível 3.
description.spanish: El nivel de ataque se ha mejorado a 3.
description.russian: Вы повысили уровень атаки до 3.
description.schinese: 将攻击提升至3级。
description.tchinese: 成功提升至攻擊等級3。
description.koreana: 공격력을 3단계까지 강화했습니다.

description.english: Upgraded to Attack Level 4.
description.german: Du hast deinen Angriff auf Level 4 gesteigert.
description.french: Niveau d’attaque 4 atteint.
description.italian: Potenziato al livello attacco 4.
description.brazilian: Aprimorou o Ataque para o nível 4.
description.spanish: El nivel de ataque se ha mejorado a 4.
description.russian: Вы повысили уровень атаки до 4.
description.schinese: 将攻击提升至4级。
description.tchinese: 成功提升至攻擊等級4。
description.koreana: 공격력을 4단계까지 강화했습니다.

description.english: Upgraded to Attack Level 5.
description.german: Du hast deinen Angriff auf Level 5 gesteigert.
description.french: Niveau d’attaque 5 atteint.
description.italian: Potenziato al livello attacco 5.
description.brazilian: Aprimorou o Ataque para o nível 5.
description.spanish: El nivel de ataque se ha mejorado a 5.
description.russian: Вы повысили уровень атаки до 5.
description.schinese: 将攻击提升至5级。
description.tchinese: 成功提升至攻擊等級5。
description.koreana: 공격력을 5단계까지 강화했습니다.

description.english: Upgraded to Defense Level 3.
description.german: Du hast deine Verteidigung auf Level 3 gesteigert.
description.french: Niveau de défense 3 atteint.
description.italian: Potenziato al livello difesa 3.
description.brazilian: Aprimorou a Defesa para o nível 3.
description.spanish: El nivel de defensa se ha mejorado a 3.
description.russian: Вы повысили уровень защиты до 3.
description.schinese: 将防御提升至3级。
description.tchinese: 成功提升至防守等級3。
description.koreana: 방어력을 3단계까지 강화했습니다.

description.english: Upgraded to Defense Level 4.
description.german: Du hast deine Verteidigung auf Level 4 gesteigert.
description.french: Niveau de défense 4 atteint.
description.italian: Potenziato al livello difesa 4.
description.brazilian: Aprimorou a Defesa para o nível 4.
description.spanish: El nivel de defensa se ha mejorado a 4.
description.russian: Вы повысили уровень защиты до 4.
description.schinese: 将防御提升至4级。
description.tchinese: 成功提升至防守等級4。
description.koreana: 방어력을 4단계까지 강화했습니다.

description.english: Upgraded to Defense Level 5.
description.german: Du hast deine Verteidigung auf Level 5 gesteigert.
description.french: Niveau de défense 5 atteint.
description.italian: Potenziato al livello difesa 5.
description.brazilian: Aprimorou a Defesa para o nível 5.
description.spanish: El nivel de defensa se ha mejorado a 5.
description.russian: Вы повысили уровень защиты до 5.
description.schinese: 将防御提升至5级。
description.tchinese: 成功提升至防守等級5。
description.koreana: 방어력을 5단계까지 강화했습니다.

description.english: Completed one Incarnation's Resolution quest.
description.german: Du hast eine Entscheidungsquest für eine Inkarnation ausgeführt.
description.french: Une quête Résolution d’incarnation terminée.
description.italian: Completata una missione di risoluzione dell'incarnazione.
description.brazilian: Concluiu uma missão de Incarnação.
description.spanish: Has completado una misión de resolución de encarnación.
description.russian: Вы завершили одно задание по решению инкарнации.
description.schinese: 完成一个“英灵的决心”任务。
description.tchinese: 完成一個化身的待解決任務。
description.koreana: 화신이 일생일대의 과제로 삼은 문제를 하나 해결했습니다.

description.english: Used an Iddhi Power for the first time.
description.german: Du hast zum ersten Mal eine Iddhi-Kraft verwendet.
description.french: Pouvoir d’Iddhi utilisé pour la première fois.
description.italian: Utilizzato un potere psichico per la prima volta.
description.brazilian: Usou um Poder de Iddhi pela primeira vez.
description.spanish: Has usado un poder de iddhi por primera vez.
description.russian: Вы впервые использовали силу Иддхи.
description.schinese: 第一次使用灵力能量。
description.tchinese: 首次使用神通力。
description.koreana: 신통력을 처음으로 사용했습니다.

description.english: Used over 108 bars of Iddhi in battle.
description.german: Du hast im Kampf mehr als 108 Iddhi-Markierungen verwendet.
description.french: Plus de 108 barres d’Iddhi utilisées au combat.
description.italian: Utilizzate più di 108 barre di poteri psichici in battaglia.
description.brazilian: Usou mais de 108 barras de Iddhi em batalhas.
description.spanish: Has usado más de 108 barras de iddhi en combate.
description.russian: Вы использовали 108 ячеек Иддхи в бою.
description.schinese: 在战斗中消耗超过108条灵力。
description.tchinese: 在戰鬥中使用超過108條神通力。
description.koreana: 전투에 돌입한 상태에서 신통력을 108회 이상 사용했습니다.

description.english: Successfully performed a Clean Block.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich einen sauberen Block ausgeführt.
description.french: Blocage net effectué avec succès.
description.italian: Eseguita una Parata Immediata.
description.brazilian: Realizou um Bloqueio Perfeito.
description.spanish: Has realizado un bloqueo limpio con éxito.
description.russian: Вы успешно выполнили точный блок.
description.schinese: 成功使出完美格挡。
description.tchinese: 成功使出俐落格擋。
description.koreana: 완벽한 방어를 실시했습니다.

description.english: Successfully performed 108 Clean Blocks.
description.german: Du hast erfolgreich 108 Mal sauber geblockt ausgeführt.
description.french: 108 blocages nets effectués avec succès.
description.italian: Eseguite 108 Parate Immediate.
description.brazilian: Realizou 108 Bloqueios Perfeitos.
description.spanish: Has realizado 108 bloqueos limpios con éxito.
description.russian: Вы успешно выполнили 108 точных блоков.
description.schinese: 成功使出108次完美格挡。
description.tchinese: 成功使出108次俐落格擋。
description.koreana: 완벽한 방어를 108회 실시했습니다.

description.english: Achieved a combo of 108 hits or more.
description.german: Du hast einen Combo aus 108 Treffern oder mehr geschafft.
description.french: Combo d’au moins 108 coups effectué.
description.italian: Realizzata una combo di 108 colpi o più.
description.brazilian: Realizou um combo de 108 golpes ou mais.
description.spanish: Has logrado un combo de 108 impactos o más.
description.russian: Вы выполнили комбинацию из 108 ударов или более.
description.schinese: 完成一次包含有至少108次攻击的连击。
description.tchinese: 成功完成108次以上的連擊。
description.koreana: 연속 공격을 108회 이상 실시했습니다.

description.english: Dealt a total of 2,216,972 damage or more.
description.german: Füge insgesamt 2.216.972 Schaden oder mehr zu.
description.french: Au moins 2 216 972 points de dégâts infligés.
description.italian: Inflitti 2.216.972 di danni o più.
description.brazilian: Causou um total de 2.216.972 de dano ou mais.
description.spanish: Has infligido un total de 2 216 972 puntos de daño o más.
description.russian: Нанесите в общем 2 216 972 единицы урона или более.
description.schinese: 总计造成至少2216972点伤害。
description.tchinese: 製造的傷害達到2,216,972以上。
description.koreana: 총합 2,216,972 이상의 피해를 입혔습니다.
